message.body: Omg the owner brought his dog...and is totally flustered..it's a great moment in hot yoga history...
Haha I wish I could have been there for that! Did he bring his 3 dogs?? What classes are you going to this week?
Haha no just one...it was black, I have no idea what breed haha. I think I'm also going on Wednesday...and I could probably be talked into going on friday if you are.
